info.title: Language - Conversational Language Understanding Authoring
info.description: The language service API is a suite of natural language processing (NLP) skills built with best-in-class Microsoft machine learning algorithms. The API can be used to analyze unstructured text for tasks such as sentiment analysis, key phrase extraction, language detection and question answering. Further documentation can be found in https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/language-service/overview.0

apim_key.description: A subscription key for a Language service resource.
apim_key.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

patch.description: Creates a new project or updates an existing one.

200.description: The metadata of the updated project, if it already exists.

201.description: The metadata of the created project.

get.description: Gets the details of a project.

202.description: Successfully triggered the project deletion operation.

operation-location.description: The location of the status API for monitoring the created job.

post.description: Triggers a job to export a project's data.

operation-location.description: The location of the status API for monitoring the created job.

post.description: Triggers a job to import a project. If a project with the same name already exists, the data of that project is replaced.

202.description: operation-location header for the status of the job.

operation-location.description: The location of the status API for monitoring the created job.

post.description: Triggers a training job for a project.

202.description: operation-location header for the status of the job.

operation-location.description: The location of the status API for monitoring the created job.

get.description: Lists the deployments belonging to a project.

post.description: Swaps two existing deployments with each other.

parameters.name: swappingDeploymentJobObject
parameters.description: The job object to swap two deployments.

202.description: operation-location header for the status of the job.

operation-location.description: The location of the status API for monitoring the created job.

get.description: Gets the details of a deployment.

put.description: Creates a new deployment or replaces an existing one.

202.description: operation-location header for the status of the job.

operation-location.description: The location of the status API for monitoring the created job.

202.description: operation-location header for the status of the job.

operation-location.description: The location of the status API for monitoring the created job.

get.description: Gets the status of an existing deployment job.
Gets the status of an existing swap deployment job.
Gets the status of an export job. Once job completes, returns the project metadata, and assets.

200.description: The status of the long running operation.

get.description: Gets the result of an export job.
Gets the status for an import.

200.description: The details of the long running operation.

get.description: Lists the trained models belonging to a project.
Gets the details of a trained model.
Gets the detailed results of the evaluation for a trained model. This includes the raw inference results for the data included in the evaluation process.
Gets the evaluation summary of a trained model. The summary includes high level performance measurements of the model (E.g. F1, Precision, Recall, ..etc).
Lists the non-expired training jobs created for a project.
Gets the status for a training job.

post.description: Triggers a cancellation for a running training job.

get.description: Gets the status for a project deletion job.
Lists the supported languages for the given project type.
Lists the supported prebuilt entities that can be used while creating composed entities.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language to get supported prebuilt entities for. Required if multilingual is false.

parameters.name: multilingual
parameters.description: Whether to get the support prebuilt entities for multilingual or monolingual projects. If true, the language parameter is ignored.

200.description: The list of supported prebuilt entities.

get.description: Lists the support training config version for a given project type.

settings.description: Gets or sets the project settings.

projectName.description: Gets or sets the new project name.

multilingual.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether gets or sets whether the project is multilingual or not.

description.description: Gets or sets the new project description.

language.description: Gets or sets the project language.

jobId.description: Gets or sets the job ID.

createdDateTime.description: Gets or sets the created time.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: Gets or sets the last updated time.

expirationDateTime.description: Gets or sets the expiration time.

status.description: Gets or sets the job status.

confusionMatrix.description:
Represents the confusion matrix between two entities (the two entities can be the same entity)
            the matrix is between the actual entity that was labelled and the entity that was predicted.

truePositiveCount.description: Represents the count of true positive

trueNegativeCount.description: Represents the count of true negative

falsePositiveCount.description: Represents the count of false positive

falseNegativeCount.description: Represents the count of false negative

Error.description: Represents the definition of the error that occurred.

target.description: The target that caused the error, if applicable.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

kind.description: Represents the evaluation kind. By default, the evaluation kind is set to percentage.

trainingSplitPercentage.description: Represents the training dataset split percentage. Only needed in case the evaluation kind is percentage.

testingSplitPercentage.description: Represents the testing dataset split percentage. Only needed in case the evaluation kind is percentage.

value.description: Gets or sets the utterances predictions.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the next page link.

entitiesEvaluation.description: Contains the data related to entities evaluation.

intentsEvaluation.description: Contains the data related to intents evaluation.

stringIndexType.description: Specifies the method used to interpret string offsets. For additional information see https://aka.ms/text-analytics-offsets.

dataset.description: The dataset for this utterance. Allowed values are 'Train' and 'Test'.

jobId.description: Gets or sets the job ID.

createdDateTime.description: Gets or sets the created time.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: Gets or sets the last updated time.

expirationDateTime.description: Gets or sets the expiration time.

status.description: Gets or sets the job status.

jobId.description: Gets or sets the job ID.

createdDateTime.description: Gets or sets the created time.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: Gets or sets the last updated time.

expirationDateTime.description: Gets or sets the expiration time.

status.description: Gets or sets the job status.

truePositiveCount.description: Represents the count of true positive

trueNegativeCount.description: Represents the count of true negative

falsePositiveCount.description: Represents the count of false positive

falseNegativeCount.description: Represents the count of false negative

confusionMatrix.description:
Represents the confusion matrix between two intents (the two intents can be the same intent)
            the matrix is between the actual intent that was labelled and the intent that was predicted.

jobId.description: Gets or sets the job ID.

createdDateTime.description: Gets or sets the created time.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: Gets or sets the last updated time.

expirationDateTime.description: Gets or sets the expiration time.

status.description: Gets or sets the job status.

deploymentExpirationDate.description: Represents deployment expiration date in the runtime.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the next page link.

lastTrainedDateTime.description: Represents the project last trained datetime.

lastDeployedDateTime.description: Represents the project last deployed datetime.

settings.description: Gets or sets the project settings.

projectName.description: Gets or sets the new project name.

multilingual.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether gets or sets whether the project is multilingual or not.

description.description: Gets or sets the new project description.

language.description: Gets or sets the project language.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the next page link.

modelId.description: Represents the ID of this model.

lastTrainedDateTime.description: Represents trained model last trained time.

lastTrainingDurationInSeconds.description: Represents trained model last training duration in seconds.

modelTrainingConfigVersion.description: Represents the model training config version.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the next page link.

status.description: Represents the status of the job.

languageName.description: Gets or sets the language name.

languageCode.description: Gets or sets the language code.

modelExpirationDate.description: Represents the training config version expiration date in the format of ("yyyy-MM-dd").

value.description: Gets or sets the training config versions.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the next page link.

trainingConfigVersion.description:
Represents training config version.
            By default, "latest" value is used which uses the latest released training config version.

trainingMode.description: Represents the training mode of the training operation.

evaluationOptions.description: Represents the evaluation options. By default, the evaluation kind is percentage, with training split percentage as 80, and testing split percentage as 20.

trainingMode.description: Represents the training mode of the training operation.

estimatedEndDateTime.description: Represents the estimate end date time for training and evaluation.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the next page link.

jobId.description: Gets or sets the job ID.

createdDateTime.description: Gets or sets the created time.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: Gets or sets the last updated time.

expirationDateTime.description: Gets or sets the expiration time.

status.description: Gets or sets the job status.

offset.description: Represents the entity offset index relative to the original text.

entitiesResult.description: Represents the entities results for the utterance.

intentsResult.description: Represents the intents results for the utterance.

FormatInQuery.name: format
FormatInQuery.description: The format of the project to export. The currently supported format is `clu`.

StringIndexTypeInQuery.name: stringIndexType
StringIndexTypeInQuery.description: Specifies the method used to interpret string offsets. For additional information see https://aka.ms/text-analytics-offsets.

ProjectKindInQuery.name: projectKind
ProjectKindInQuery.description: The project kind to get the supported languages for.
